Insights.name: Protocols by Chain
Insights.description: TVL, Fees, Volume metrics of all protocols on each chain

Insights.name: All Chains
Insights.description: Combined TVL, Fees, Volume and other metrics of all protocols on all chains

Insights.name: Categories
Insights.description: Combined TVL, Revenue and other metrics by category of all protocols that are tracked by DefiLlama

Insights.name: Top Protocols
Insights.description: Overview of top protocols with the highest TVL by chain on each category

Insights.name: Bridged TVL by Chain
Insights.description: Value of all tokens held on the chain

Insights.name: Oracles
Insights.description: Total Value Secured by an oracle, where oracle failure would lead to a loss equal to TVS

Insights.name: Forks
Insights.description: Sum of TVL across all forks of a protocol

Insights.name: TVL Breakdown by Smart Contract Languages
Insights.description: TVL breakdown by languages that the smart contracts are written in

Insights.name: Total Borrowed by Protocol
Insights.description: Sum of value currently borrowed across all active loans on a lending protocol

Insights.name: Total Staked by Protocol
Insights.description: Total value of protocols own tokens staked on their platform

Insights.name: Pool2 TVL by Protocol
Insights.description: Total value locked in pool2 of a protocol

Insights.name: Revenue by Protocol
Insights.description: Subset of fees that the protocol collects for itself, usually going to the protocol treasury, the team or distributed among token holders. This doesn't include any fees distributed to liquidity providers

Insights.name: Fees by Protocol
Insights.description: Total fees paid by users when using the protocol

Insights.name: Holders Revenue by Protocol
Insights.description: Subset of revenue that is distributed to token holders by means of buyback and burn, burning fees or direct distribution to stakers

Insights.name: Earnings by Protocol
Insights.description: Net revenue retained by the protocol after subtracting token incentives distributed to users. Calculated as Revenue minus Incentives (emissions paid out through liquidity mining, farming programs, or similar rewards). Reflects the actual economic value accrued to the protocol itself.

Insights.name: Fees by Chain
Insights.description: Sum of all fees paid by users when using protocols on the chain

Insights.name: Revenue by Chain
Insights.description: Sum of all revenue earned by protocols on the chain

Insights.name: P/F by Protocol
Insights.description: Market cap / annualized fees

Insights.name: P/S by Protocol
Insights.description: Market cap / annualized revenue

Insights.name: REV by Chain
Insights.description: Sum of chain fees and MEV tips

Insights.name: App Revenue by Chain
Insights.description: Sum of all revenue earned by the apps on the chain. Excludes stablecoins, liquid staking apps, and gas fees

Insights.name: DEX Volume by Protocol
Insights.description: Volume of all spot token swaps that go through a DEX

Insights.name: Perp Volume by Protocol
Insights.description: Notional volume of all trades in a perp exchange, includes leverage

Insights.name: Bridge Aggregator Volume by Protocol
Insights.description: Sum of value of all assets that were bridged through a bridge aggregator

Insights.name: DEX Volume by Chain
Insights.description: Sum of all volume of all spot token swaps that go through all DEXs on the chain

Insights.name: DEX Aggregator Volume by Protocol
Insights.description: Volume of spot token swaps that go through a DEX aggregator

Insights.name: Perp Volume by Chain
Insights.description: Sum of notional volume of all trades in all perp exchanges on the chain, includes leverage

Insights.name: Options Premium Volume by Protocol
Insights.description: Sum of value paid buying and selling options

Insights.name: Options Notional Volume by Protocol
Insights.description: Sum of the notional value of all options that have been traded on an options exchange

Insights.name: Open Interest by Protocol
Insights.description: Total notional value of all outstanding perpetual futures positions

Insights.name: Perp Aggregator Volume by Protocol
Insights.description: Notional volume of all trades in a perp aggregator, includes leverage

Insights.name: Stablecoins by Market Cap
Insights.description: Total market cap of stable assets

Insights.name: Stablecoin Supply by Chain
Insights.description: Total market cap of stable assets currently deployed on each chain

Insights.name: Airdrops
Insights.description: Tokenless protocols that may airdrop tokens to their users

Insights.name: Unlocks Overview
Insights.description: Overview of token emissions by protocol

Insights.name: Unlocks Calendar
Insights.description: Upcoming total token emissions by date

Insights.name: Protocols by Market Cap
Insights.description: Token price multiplied by circulating supply of each protocol

Insights.name: Protocols by FDV
Insights.description: Token price multiplied by fully diluted supply of each protocol

Insights.name: Protocols by Outstanding FDV
Insights.description: Token price multiplied by outstanding supply of each protocol. Outstanding supply is the total supply minus the supply that is not yet allocated to anything (eg coins in treasury or reserve).

Insights.name: Borrow Aggregator: Simple
Insights.description: Simple view of optimal lending routes by collateral to borrow assets

Insights.name: Borrow Aggregator: Advanced
Insights.description: Advanced view of optimal lending routes by collateral to borrow assets

Insights.name: Yields: All Pools
Insights.description: Pools by APY, TVL, and other metrics on all chains

Insights.name: Yields: Stablecoin Pools
Insights.description: APYs of pools with stablecoins

Insights.name: Yields: Leveraged Lending
Insights.description: Pools by leveraged lending APY values

Insights.name: Yields: Long/Short Strategies
Insights.description: Find 'long-short' strategies across all our tracked pools

Insights.name: Yields: All Projects
Insights.description: List of all projects that we track in our yields section

Insights.name: Yields: APY Overview
Insights.description: Find APY trends, volatility, and other metrics across all our tracked pools

Insights.name: Yields: Halal
Insights.description: Shariah-compliant yield pools

Insights.name: Yields: Delta Neutral Strategies
Insights.description: Find 'lend-borrow-farm' strategies across all our tracked pools

Insights.name: CEXs
Insights.description: Sum of assets held on a centralized exchanges

Insights.name: Narrative Trackers
Insights.description: MCap-Weighted category performance to track narrative changes in the ecosystem

Insights.name: Staked ETH by Protocol
Insights.description: Total value of ETH staked on LSTs

Insights.name: ETF
Insights.description: AUM, Flows, Volume metrics of all ETFs

Insights.name: Governance
Insights.description: Overview of all governance proposals by protocol

Insights.name: Bridges by Volume
Insights.description: Sum of value of all assets that were bridged through the protocol

Insights.name: Bridge Volume by Chain
Insights.description: Sum of value of all assets that were bridged through the protocol on each chain

Insights.name: Treasuries
Insights.description: Value of tokens owned by a protocol, including it's own token and breakdown of assets held

Insights.name: Net Project Treasury
Insights.description: Value of tokens owned by a protocol, excluding it's own token

Insights.name: Raises: Overview
Insights.description: Total amount of capital raised by a project

Insights.name: Investors
Insights.description: List of investors that have invested in a project

Insights.name: Hacks: Overview
Insights.description: Overview of all hacks that have happened in the ecosystem

Insights.name: Total Value Lost in Hacks by Protocol
Insights.description: Net user loss, total value lost in hacks by a protocol

Insights.name: NFTs: Collections
Insights.description: Overview of all NFT collections

Insights.name: NFTs: Marketplaces
Insights.description: Overview of all NFT marketplaces

Insights.name: NFTs: Collection Earnings
Insights.description: Earnings of all NFT collections that are tracked by DefiLlama

Insights.name: NFT Volume by Chain
Insights.description: Volume of all NFTs that are tracked by DefiLlama traded on the chain
